Articles.Content: Can someone help me spawn military vehicles controlled by AI in random locations so as to create a military campaign? The idea is to place military units like mission markers n u need to engage them there.

On 7/19/2018 at 12:38 PM, LuciferZ25 said:

Can someone help me spawn military vehicles controlled by AI in random locations so as to create a military campaign? The idea is to place military units like mission markers n u need to engage them there.

There is a vessel mover mod which allows you to manually spawn stuff. There is also the OrX mod which is under development.
Yeah I've them. But I can't find the OrX mod. Can u plz give the link ?

7 hours ago, DoctorDavinci said:

Would you be so kind as to NOT SHARE MY UNRELEASED MOD 

You are putting me in a position to be hit with copyright claims as not all of the licensing is finished and your not even supposed to have it

 

Sorry doc. I have deleted everything i downloaded regarding copyright issues.
